    type: 'POST', // defaults to 'GET'
    url: 'http://rest',
    data: {user: 'soyjavi', pass: 'twitter'},
    dataType: 'json', //'json', 'xml', 'html', or 'text'
    async: true,
    success: function(response) { ... },
    error: function(xhr, type) { ... }
});
